name: YFY Group
overview: Founded in 1923, Taipei based YFY Group is one of the oldest and largest business groups in Greater China. Centered around Taiwan listed holding company YFY Paper, the group controls over 100 subsidiaries in pulp and paper, printing, electronic components, financial service, bio-tech, and other industries. Among others, YFY owns Greater China’s No. 1 packaging company (YFY Packaging), Greater China’s largest commerical printing group, Taiwan 4th private-sector financial service company (SinoPac Holdings), and the world-leading E-Paper dispaly manufacturer (Prime View Int’l)

funding_round.source_description: TaiGen Biotechnology Secures 37 Million USD in Series C Round Financing
